TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_tay_Piyoxo, title = Piyoxo, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Atayal]}, url = {https://tay.wikipedia.org/wiki/Piyoxo} }

S.FORM: alang Piyoxo ga niya mki sku Tayto Keng atu Cinkong Song, kwara sali buwan nya ga 228 buwan, 595 hi ku kwara s'uli tayan. s'uli tayan pinspngan Gyencumin ga 70% kyan ku 415 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahun sku pinspngan Gyencumin ga 30% kyan ku 180 hi nya. pinspung na linhuyan Gyencumin ga, Amis 65%, Paywan 1%, Puyuma 1%, binah lihuyan s'uli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Piyoxo hya' ga Torik. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssquliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan alang Piyoxo ga ungat pqwasan biru. tuqi 'san basu kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbahu Ubuy qqmayh

alang Piyoxo ga niya mki sko Tayto Keng ato Cinkong Song, kwara sali bowan nya ga 228 bowan, 595 hi ko kwara s'oli tayan. s'oli tayan pinspngan Gyencomin ga 70% kyan ko 415 hi, binah ga, 'yat kahon sko pinspngan Gyencomin ga 30% kyan ko 180 hi nya. pinspong na linhoyan Gyencomin ga, Amis 65%, Paywan 1%, Poyoma 1%, binah lihoyan s'oli 3%. rhzyal kki'an tay mkraya' na Piyoxo hya' ga Torik. rekisi kayal kyokay maki 2 kyokay. ssqoliq pinlpgan ppqbaqan alang Piyoxo ga ongat pqwasan biro. toqi 'san baso kisya' glgan spyangan na pinbaho Uboy qqmayh
